devdoc.author: Superfluid
devdoc.details: Set `using for ISuperToken` in including file, and call any of these functions on an instance of ISuperToken. Note that it is important to "warm up" the cache and cache the host, cfa, ida before calling, this is only applicable to Foundry tests where the vm.expectRevert() will not work as expected.
devdoc.title: Library for Token Centric Interface
